Patent Information.Patent Title: Anti-microbial Peptides And Methods Of Use Thereof
Patent Information.Abstract: Anti-microbial peptides and methods of use are provided.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.15556063]Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=13 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=25 µM);Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=70 µM).
Sequence Information.Function: Has inhibitory activity towards reference strains of bacteria and an opportunistic yeast pathogen. Also has hemolytic activity against human erythrocytes.

Literature.Title: Purification and characterization of antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretions of the mink frog (Rana septentrionalis).
Literature.Reference: Comp Biochem Physiol C Toxicol Pharmacol. 2004 Oct;139(1-3)31-38.
Literature.Author: Bevier CR, Sonnevend A, Kolodziejek J, Nowotny N, Nielsen PF, Conlon JM.
